rukus.text: Ka keuh Neulaknat dum jih le Allah Bani Israil nyang ka jikaphe Neulaknat sare jih nyan le Allah Daod ngon Isa aneuk Mariyam Ngon lidah gopnyan laknat Neupeugah Sabab awaknyan ka darohaka Ngon lalem raya jipubuet salah
Hana jitham-tham bak buet nyang jeuheut Bandum jipubuet nyang brok sileupah
Takalon le that nibak awaknyan Jitulong mulong ngon kaphe jadah Brok that jikeubah amai keudroe jih Nyan keuh awak jih beungeh that Allah Keukai lam azeub di jih di sinan

Meunyo jiiman han roe jih salah Tuhan ngon nabi meunyo jiiman Lom nyang Neupeutron bak nabiyullah Teuntee han jitueng kaphe keu wali Sabab di nabi ka lheuh neupeugah Tapi nyang le that nibak awaknyan Hana meuiman pasek that leupah

Nyang leupah musoh keu ureueng mukmin Keubit takalon Yahudi jadah Sabe ngon muchrek kaphe harbi Awak Yahudi hana meuubah Teuma takalon nyang laen lagi Awak Nasrani droejih jipeugah Di jih leubeh toe ngon ureueng mukmin Silatur rahim han that meupisah Sabab na raheb dalam kawan jih í Pendeta di jih pih na jikeubah (QUZ 7) Awaknyan teuma hana teukabo d Han that jitajo bak buet nyang salah

(Watee geudeungo peue nyang Neupeutro) Bak rasul Tuhan geumoe le bagah Teujoh ie mata sabab geuteupue i Beuna atranyoe tron nibak Allah Teuma geukheun le meuiman kamoe Hai Tuhan kamoe peue nyang Neupeugah Í Neutuleh kamoe lam kawan saksi Peue beuna nabi nyang ba risalah
Boh pakon teuma han meu meuiman f Atra bak Tuhan beuna that leupah Beu Neupeutamong napsu that kamoe Le Tuhan kamoe bak teumpat indah Í Ngon ureueng saleh kamoe beu sapat

Teuma Hadharat laju Neubalah Peue nyang geulakee Neujok le sigra Dalam churuga keunan Neukeubah Ile deungon krueng di yup churuga Sipanyang masa seunang sileupah f Meunan keuh balah ureueng pubuet got Churuga teumpat Neubri le Allah
Teuma nyang kaphe keu ayat Kamoe y Jikheun ayat nyoe sulet that leupah Nyan keuh awaknyan asoe nuraka Hana soe bela saket sileupah
